mapper.select: select mess.medical_list_id as mListId, c_p_r.drug_id as code, d_i.drug_name as name, c_p_r.pay_count as nums, d_i.unit as unit, (c_p_r.pay_count*d_i.price) as amount, d_i.price as unitPrice, patient_info.patient_feature as feature from check_purchase_records c_p_r join drug_info d_i on c_p_r.drug_id = d_i.drug_id join ((select medical_list_id,patient_id from medical_list where outpatient_id = #{id} order by record_time desc limit 1) mess join patient_info on mess.patient_id = patient_info.patient_id) on c_p_r.medical_list_id = mess.medical_list_id;
